title: US Supreme Court clears Texas to use Trump-backed voting map
description:
The US Supreme Court has cleared Texas to use a redrawn, Republican-favored voting map for the 2026 midterm elections, staying a lower court’s ruling.

Read More: https://punchng.com/us-supreme-court-clears-texas-to-use-trump-backed-voting-map/
content: The US Supreme Court on Thursday allowed Texas to use redrawn congressional districts for the 2026 midterm elections, boosting the hopes of President Donald Trump’s Republicans to retain control of t… [+2963 chars]
